articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: Re CEX 类是全托管方案，2 把私钥均在交易所；Pooled 类本质是“类全托管”，在验证 key 做到了去中心化，但提现是 Lido\RPL金库统一地址的”大池子“；SaaS 类与 Pooled 类的区别即提现地址也在用户手上的”小池子“；Solo 类则是去中心化和安全性拉到满星但效率较低的方案。阅读全文： https://mirror.xyz/0x17f3F81860345567482E1D232FB5B6f8bD77f3Bd/mcgqcKozJPlcLfP1G3dv5JDAUpcYJ6-Eu4ND08xSTiQ

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: 从 Staking 聊起，4 种掌控以太坊网络的方式：（作者：@0x_Todd）本质上，Staking 最重要的是看 2 把私钥——"验证 key "与“提现key"的归属权，由于归属权不同，诞生了 4 类 Staking 方案——CEX 类；大池子类（Pooled Staking）；SaaS类（Staking as a Service）；Solo类。

Steady lads.

只是我好想你
这是我唯一能和你见面的借口
假如我年少有为不自卑
懂得什么是挪用客户资金

Day 33: 150 wallets got a total of 25M testnet tokens.
2 days later 13M (65%) were staked, and 8M were burned. So. . . 2 days in all supply is locked 😆
Why?
Stake tokens to get eggs
Burn Token to hatch eggs
Burn more to level up
Kill to unlock tokens https://goerli.etherscan.io/token/0xeb14c1e5468f9277b1415f8cf44cc13396c6a516?a=0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000

articles.description:
Re If a  high %age of RLB participates in every lottery, the RLB supply is burnt extremely quickly.
Assuming the original 5B supply of RLB participated in every lottery, 45% of the supply would be burned every year 
(Crude math: 5B tokens x 500 lotteries x 0.1% = ~50%)

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Re In order to enter the lottery, RLB holders must pay 0.2% of their RLB, half of which is burnt.
So 0.1% of the RLB supply participating in the lottery is burnt every lottery.

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Re The $RLB token is a claim on 20% of 
But in order to see that 20% of revenue, RLB holders must stake in a lottery that's held once every 100 #Bitcoin blocks, or every 15-20 hours.
It works out to around 500 lotteries a year. http://rolllbit.com

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
I've been researching the $RLB token and the coin doesn't seem that interesting at >$100M market cap.
TLDR: The ponzinomics break down at high market cap of $RLB relative to lottery winnings.
Thoughts below. Would love to hear alternative takes.
